headline: Will DXC Technology’s (DXC) New AI Partnership Signal a Turning Point in Its Enterprise Strategy?
summary: In early October 2025, Digital Realty announced a collaboration with Dell Technologies and DXC Technology to deliver integrated private AI solutions for enterprises, combining Dell's AI infrastructure, DXC's implementation expertise, and Digital Realty's data center platforms. This partnership aims to accelerate practical enterprise AI adoption by offering validated use cases, secure deployments, and comprehensive implementation services tailored to large-scale business needs. We'll explore...
